LightningComponentBundle.description: Automatically deletes a record when the user navigates away or closes the page. Useful for cleaning up temporary/draft records. Note: Validation errors will prevent navigation and deletion.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID to Delete
property.description: The ID of the record to delete when exiting

property.name: deleteOnNavigate
property.label: Delete On Navigate
property.description: Delete record when user navigates away using back button, next button, or changes screens

property.name: deleteOnPageClose
property.label: Delete On Page Close
property.description: Delete record when user closes browser tab/window or refreshes the page

property.name: cascadeDelete
property.label: Cascade Delete Children
property.description: Automatically delete Master-Detail child records before deleting this record. Only affects true parent-child relationships, not lookups.

property.name: lookupChildRelationships
property.label: Lookup Child Relationships
property.description: Comma-separated list of child relationship API names ending in __r (e.g., 'Contacts,Custom_Children__r,namespace__Custom_Objects__r'). Find these in the child object's lookup field under 'Child Relationship Name'.
